item.title: Ecohydrological Modeling with Stable Isotopes
item.description: Collaborators J Archibald, JO Knighton, CK Morris, MT Walter (all at Cornell University) Timeline 2016-2017 Project Goal The goal of this project was to develop an ecohydrological model that could be used to test the two-water-world hypothesis presented here. Project Links IsoJoFlow Ecohydrology Model Project Peer-Reviewed Publication Acknowledgements Thanks to J. Evaristo, S Jasechko, and J. McDonnell for their paper that stoked our lab group conversations around this work.
